content:
As an AI language model, I don't have access to the latest and current measures taken by Serie A. However, according to the official website of Serie A, in previous fixtures, the league has implemented a series of protocols to ensure social distancing within stadiums during matches.

Some of the measures that have been taken are:

-Reductions in stadium capacity to ensure social distancing protocols are followed.

-Mandatory wearing of masks and temperature checks for those entering the stadium.

-Fans are seated at least one meter apart.

-Limited access to stadium facilities such as food and beverage concessions is provided. 

-Regular cleaning and disinfection of high-touch surfaces, such as handrails, seats, and restrooms.

- An app is used to facilitate the tracking of contact between spectators.

However, it is recommended to check the full and updated measures taken by Serie A before attending any of their matches.
